compatibility.notes: The copyleft-next-0.3.0 license has a strong copyleft effect, meaning that any derivative works must also be licensed under the same terms. This can lead to incompatibility with permissive licenses.

key_requirements: Provide a URL for the Corresponding Source when distributing Object Code.
Ensure that the Corresponding Source is available for two years if distributed in a physical product.
license.name: copyleft-next-0.3.0
obligations: Inform recipients how they can obtain a copy of this License.
Preserve all Legal Notices contained in the Work.
License the entire Derived Work under this License when distributing.
Do not impose further restrictions on the exercise of rights granted under this License.
